data.name: CannotSpecifySchemaOwnerAndNotTable
data.value: The schema cannot be specified if the tabel is not specified

data.name: CanOnlyUseQueriesInInnerSelects
data.value: The inner statements to a sub query can only be the root Query items - Select, insert, update, delete etc.

data.name: CantDeserializeXML
data.value: Could not deserialise the Xml stream. The element '{0}' was not a known Query element.

data.name: ConnectionStringNotSet
data.value: Cannot create a DBDatabase with an empty connection string.

data.name: ConnectionStringNotSetInConfig
data.value: The connectionString attribute in the connection settings section with name '{0}' of the config file is not set

data.name: InvalidProviderNameForConnection
data.value: The provider name '{0}' is not associated with a known DbProviderFactory

data.name: InvalidProviderNameInConfigForConnection
data.value: The provider name '{0}' set in the connection string section '{1}' is not associated with a known DbProviderFactory

data.name: NoColumnNameSpecifiedForAField
data.value: The column cannot be identified because the name has not been set

data.name: NoConfiguredConnectionWithName
data.value: The configuration file does not contain a ConnectionStrings element with the name '{0}'. Please Add this connection to the configuration file, or change the name to a different connection.

data.name: NoConnectionStringName
data.value: Cannot create a DBDatabase with an empty connectionStringName value

data.name: NoParameterWithGenericName
data.value: The DbCommand does not contain a parameter with a matching generic name '{0}'.

data.name: NoTableNameSpecifiedForATable
data.value: The table or view cannot be identified because the name has not been set.

data.name: NotSerializeDelegate
data.value: Cannot serialize or de-serialize a Delegate parameter. Please use a constant parameter and set the value as required

data.name: ProviderNameNotSet
data.value: Cannot create a DBDatabase with an empty provider name

data.name: ProviderNameNotSetInConfig
data.value: The providerName attribute in the connection settings section with name '{0}' of the config file is not set

data.name: CannotAddToSchemaWithNullOrEmptyName
data.value: The schema item could not be added to the collection because the Name was a null or empty string

data.name: CannotGetPropertiesFromDB
data.value: Could not retrieve the properties from the specified database. Check the inner exception for more details.

data.name: CannotCreateStatementBuilderForProvider
data.value: No DBStatement builder was returned from the factory for the database provider '{0}'.

data.name: MySqlAutoIncrementMustBeKey
data.value: On a MySql database the Auto Increment column must be the one and only primary key

data.name: ContainerNotSetOnIndexReference
data.value: The index reference wust have a valid Table reference set as its container inorder to uniquely identifiy it.

data.name: SchemaColumnNotFound
data.value: The SchemaProvider could not find a column with the name '{0}'. This is a required column

data.name: SchemaColumnCannotBeEmpty
data.value: The schema column '{0}' cannot have a null or empty value.

data.name: ProfilerAlreadyAttached
data.value: A profiler is already attached to this DBDatabase. Only one profiler is currently supported on a DBDatabase instance.

data.name: ProfilerCollectionChangedBetweenStartAndEnd
data.value: The DBProfilerCollection has changed between a call to Begin and End execution. The profiler data cannot be validated

data.name: ProfilerFactoryTypeCouldNotBeInstantiated
data.value: The defined profiler factory with name '{0}' could not be created, or does not implement the IDBProfilerFactory interface

data.name: ProfilerFactoryTypeNotFound
data.value: The type of profiler factory with name '{0}' could not be found

data.name: NoJoinLimits
data.value: Join does not have any comparion limits.

data.name: NoJoinRightReference
data.value: Join does not have a reference to a right hand table or sub query

data.name: ExecutionFailedAgainstDatabase
data.value: The command could not be executed against the database. Please check the inner exception for more details.

data.name: CannotAppendWhereClauseWithoutInitial
data.value: A secondary where clause cannot be appended a no initial clause is present

data.name: InvalidProviderNameForDBFactory
data.value: The provider name '{0}' is not associated with a known Perceiveit.Data.DBProviderImplementation. Add a new configuration element within the Perceiveit.Data/Implementations element to 'Register' the provider name with a type.

data.name: ConfigElementNotDBProfiler
data.value: The returned configuration element was not the correct type - expecting DBProfilerConfigElement.

data.name: NoProviderImplementationWithTheName
data.value: There is no registered DBProviderImplementation for the name '{0}'.

data.name: ProfilerNameNotSetInConfig
data.value: A defined profiler in the configuration file does not have its name set. All profiers must have a non-empty name.

data.name: ProviderNameNotSetInProviderImplementation
data.value: The provider name for a configured implementation is not set, or is an emty value. Please check the configuration section 'Perceiveit.Data/Implementations'

data.name: NoDefaultForColumn
data.value: Last item added to the create statement does not support default values

data.name: DatabaseEngineDoesntSupportType
data.value: This database engine does not support the schema type '{0}'.

data.name: DBDoesntSupportIfExistsForThisType
data.value: The {0} database does not support the IF EXISTS or IF NOT EXISTS constructs for the schema type '{1}'

data.name: OLEDbDoesNotSupportDefaultValues
data.value: The Ole Db Create Table statement does not support default values on a column.

data.name: SqlLiteDoesntSupportOnReferencesForIndexes
data.value: SQLite does not support the ON construct when dropping table indexes. You must simply use the DROP INDEX on it's own without a table reference.

data.name: SequenceCreationIsNotSupportedOnThisEngine
data.value: The creation and use of sequences is not supported on this database engine

data.name: CannotUseTopAsInnerWriterNotSupportPosition
data.value: The Top N functions cannot be used as the inner text writers positon cannot be modified.

data.name: CannotBuildCreateType
data.value: This database statement builder cannot build CREATE statements for type '{0}'

data.name: CheckExistsIsNotSupported
data.value: Check Exists is not supported by this database engine implementation

data.name: CheckNotExistsIsNotSupported
data.value: Check NotExists is not supported by this Database engine implementation.

data.name: CannotUseClusteredOrNonClustered
data.value: The database engine does not support CLUSTERED or NON CLUSTERED indexes

data.name: NoRootOrLastForHint
data.value: No root or last table set to add the hint to

data.name: CannotParseValueToType
data.value: The value '{0}' could not be parsed to type '{1}'

data.name: CannotDeserializeObjectTypesInSilverlight
data.value: It is not possible to deserialize objects from binary format in Silverlight.

data.name: ObjectNamesCannotContainIdentifierCharacters
data.value: Object name such as '{0}' are not allowed to contain the control characters that start and terminate identifiers - {1} or {2}
